text:
M. S. NOVIK
March 11, 1955
Harry •
Thanks for letting me see the enclosed
correspondence re Linck.
Actually, AFTRA has not taken any position.
They are sympathetic. If you want me to give
him any infoimation, sic him on to me and I
will do it. If it's not important, let’s just
forget about it.
MSN j ck
a
l
